name: Batman Portraits
description:
This is part of a huge project of superhero portraits.
You can arrange them on your wall by teams, or by character "families"-- display the Justice League featuring the Adam West Batman and the George Reeves Superman, or go with the classic comic stylings.  It's all up to you.

The first entries in the series will be Batman related-- offering here the iconic 1939, 1940, 1943, 1949 and 1966 Batman characters.  

Choose the print you want from the drop down menu, and select signed and dated or unsigned in the options.  We are only doing a run of 50 signed prints.

PRE-ORDER-- These ship out at the end of January 2014.
11x17 full color high quality professionally printed.  

MANY MORE COMING SOON!

name: THE REAL BATMAN... POSTCARD SET
description:
Set of Two ProFesSionaLLY printed postcards measuring 4x6 each sold only as a set and featuring the artwork from Andy Fish's newest print series.

SET OF TWO PRINTS
PRE-ORDER Ships out January 22, 2014

Cannot combine shipping with prints because these ship flat.

name: THE DYNAMIC DUO!
description:
An homage to the "real" Batman to a lot of us, Adam West and his Boy Wonder, Robin as played by Burt Ward. While I like a lot of things about the modern Batman films-- to me, this sums it up-- the real Batman doesn't wear black rubber.

Measures 11x17 on high quality cardstock professionally printed. 
EXTREMELY LIMITED EDITION.

Available for PRE-ORDER 
BLACK and WHITE or FULL COLOR Version available.
Ships Jan 20, 2014 UNSIGNED 
Ships Jan 31, 2014 Signed by the artist 
ADAM WEST Signed Edition is SOLD OUT - Thank you!

The ORIGINAL PENCIL DRAWING (not shown) used for the creation of the art is also AVAILABLE.  This is hand drawn and completely original and one of a kind.  $400.00/USD 

A PAYMENT PLAN IS AVAILABLE FOR ALL of THESE ITEMS-- Choose DOWN PAYMENT and contact andy@andytfish.com to arrange a payment plan over the course of several months. PAY for ANY PRINT or ORIGINAL ART in an easy PAYMENT PLAN!  I want to make this available to as many people as possible. NO REFUNDS on PAYMENT PLAN OPTION. Your payment is a commitment to buy.

name: 9x12 Original Art Commission!
description:
You choose the character and it will be drawn as a completely original one of a kind piece of artwork in either pencil or ink on 9x12 bristol using high quality art materials.

Why buy a print when you can own a one of a kind ORIGINAL piece of art!  Whether you're buying for investment or enjoyment there is nothing like original art!

You get to choose the character. This pricing is for a single character piece--  Contact us for multiple character commissions.

A PAYMENT PLAN IS AVAILABLE FOR THIS ITEM-- Choose DOWN PAYMENT and contact andy@andytfish.com to arrange a payment plan over the course of several months.  I want to make this available to as many people as possible.  NO REFUNDS on PAYMENT PLAN OPTION. Your payment is a commitment to buy.
